医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的尿液检测为早期发现和预防宫颈癌带来了巨大希望宫颈癌是女性最常见的癌症之一，仅 2022 年，全球就有约 660,000 例新发病例和 350,000 例死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-urine-based-test-holds-great-promise-for-early-detection-and-prevention-of-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-urine-based-test-holds-great-promise-for-early-detection-and-prevention-of-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f975050-3256-489d-a726-0fc492ab11f1 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 08:28:35 -0400 New urine-based test holds great promise for early detection and prevention of cervical cancer
推进基因组学研究：Azenta Life Sciences 新牛津基因组实验室的内部观察本次采访深入探讨了 Azenta Life Sciences 的新牛津基因组实验室的能力和服务，讨论了其在推进英国基因组研究方面的作用、独特的设置流程以及未来的扩展计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Advancing-genomics-research-An-inside-look-at-Azenta-Life-Sciences-new-Oxford-Genomics-Laboratory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Advancing-genomics-research-An-inside-look-at-Azenta-Life-Sciences-new-Oxford-Genomics-Laboratory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c6b4588-1482-46a7-b948-57fc19235557 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 08:14:00 -0400 Advancing genomics research: An inside look at Azenta Life Sciences' new Oxford Genomics Laboratory
计划生育突击抢夺共和党席位，押注堕胎恐惧会影响选民计划生育联合会正在准备一场七位数的竞选闪电战，以将共和党现任议员从加州国会席位中驱逐出去，这是生殖权利组织为阻止共和党多数派通过堕胎限制（包括全国禁令）而在全国范围内所做的更大努力的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Planned-parenthood-to-blitz-GOP-seats-betting-abortion-fears-can-sway-voters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Planned-parenthood-to-blitz-GOP-seats-betting-abortion-fears-can-sway-voters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd27383b-3c47-4abe-b7e8-5efec257f176 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 08:04:16 -0400 Planned parenthood to blitz GOP seats, betting abortion fears can sway voters
实验室背后：Colman Byrne 谈分析服务的关键作用在这次采访中，News-Medical 与 Byrne 先生讨论了分析服务的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Behind-the-lab-doors-Colman-Byrne-on-the-crucial-role-of-analytical-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Behind-the-lab-doors-Colman-Byrne-on-the-crucial-role-of-analytical-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d619293b-828e-4a45-908c-633438caf6e7 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 07:03:00 -0400 Behind the lab doors: Colman Byrne on the crucial role of analytical services
研究表明，减少加工肉类消费可以减轻美国慢性病的负担研究人员开发了一种微观模拟模型，即食品转化对健康影响的微观模拟，以评估减少加工和未加工肉类摄入量对美国心血管疾病、2 型糖尿病、结直肠癌和死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Reducing-processed-meat-conspiration-could-reduce-burden-of-chronic-diseases-in-the-USA-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Reducing-processed-meat-conspiration-could-reduce-burden-of-chronic-diseases-in-the-USA-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c4b8ff5-cbb3-45bb-abb6-86f680ee0990 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 06:25:00 -0400 Reducing processed meat consumption could reduce burden of chronic diseases in the USA, study suggests

非影像自我报告工具有效预测冠状动脉粥样硬化研究人员评估了非影像数据是否可用于识别冠状动脉粥样硬化患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Nonimaging-self-report-tool- effectively-predicts-coronary-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Nonimaging-self-report-tool- effectively-predicts-coronary-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d6ef460-9b3f-4ad7-8d85-9801e11474c6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 04:27:00 -0400 Nonimaging self-report tool effectively predicts coronary atherosclerosis
你的卫生棉条中毒了吗？研究发现广泛使用的卫生棉条品牌中含有 16 种金属经期妇女常用的卫生棉条中含有金属。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Are-your-tampons-poisoning-you-Study-findings-16-metals-in-widely-available-tampon-brands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Are-your-tampons-poisoning-you-Study-findings-16-metals-in-widely-available-tampon-brands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efcb8aad-1dd6-47de-8435-8308d5bb9b9b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 03:51:00 -0400 Are your tampons poisoning you? Study findings 16 metals in widely available tampon brands
AI 模型在多个数据源中高精度地彻底改变了痴呆症诊断研究人员开发了一种利用多模态数据的人工智能模型来准确诊断不同类型的痴呆症，从而加强早期和个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-revolutionizes-dementia-diagnosis-with-high-accuracy-across-multiple-data-sources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/AI-model-revolutionizes-dementia-diagnosis-with-high-accuracy-across-multiple-data-sources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38a05d4b-308d-4a9c-b822-845af62c8241 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 02:03:00 -0400 AI model revolutionizes dementia diagnosis with high accuracy across multiple data sources
